title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-snippet
name: snippet
author: oeyoews
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-snippet/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-snippet/readme","type":"text/markdown","text":"@[toc]

## TODO

* [ ] enable snippets hint for markdown type
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-snippet/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-snippet/icon","text":"<svg width="22pt" height="22pt" viewBox="0 0 128 128"
class="tc-image-plugin-generic-plugin tc-image-button" fill="#FF7F87"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M40.397 76.446V95.34h14.12l-.001-.005a6.912 6.912 0 005.364-11.593l.046-.023a6.912 6.912 0 119.979.526l.086.055a6.914 6.914 0 004.408 10.948l-.023.092h21.32V75.568l-.15.038a6.912 6.912 0 00-11.593-5.364l-.022-.046a6.912 6.912 0 11.526-9.979l.055-.086a6.914 6.914 0 0010.948-4.408c.079.018.158.038.236.059v-15.74h-21.32l.023-.094a6.914 6.914 0 01-4.408-10.947 10.23 10.23 0 00-.086-.055 6.912 6.912 0 10-9.979-.526l-.046.023a6.912 6.912 0 01-5.364 11.593l.001.005h-14.12v12.847A6.912 6.912 0 0129.5 59.843l-.054.086a6.912 6.912 0 10-.526 9.979l.023.046a6.912 6.912 0 0111.455 6.492zM64 0l54.56 32v64L64 128 9.44 96V32L64 0z"/></svg>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/snippet":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-surfing-keys/snippet","caption":"snippet","key":"((snippet))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$navigator story="$:/StoryList" history="$:/HistoryList">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-new-tiddler" title="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/custom/snippet/"
	tags="$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet"
	caption={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/New/Title}}
	text={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/New/Text}}
/>
</$navigator>
"},"$:/language/Snippets/set field":{"title":"$:/language/Snippets/set field","caption":"set field","tags":"$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet","text":"<$action-setfield $tiddler=""
          $field="text"
          $value="yes"/>
"},"neotw/snippet/button":{"title":"neotw/snippet/button","caption":"button widget","tags":"$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$button>
$1
</$button>
"},"$:/language/Snippets/define macro":{"title":"$:/language/Snippets/define macro","caption":"define macro","tags":"$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet","text":"\define $1()

\end
"},"$:/language/Snippets/http filter":{"title":"$:/language/Snippets/http filter","caption":"http filter","tags":"$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet","text":"<$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]">
$1
</$list>
"},"$:/language/Snippets/list-mobile":{"title":"$:/language/Snippets/list-mobile","caption":"mobile filter","tags":"$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet","text":"<$list filter="[[$:/info/browser/is/mobile]get[text]else[no]match[yes]]">
$1
</$list>
"},"$:/language/Snippets/list-filter":{"title":"$:/language/Snippets/list-filter","caption":"general filter","tags":"$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet","text":"<$list filter=[[]]>
$1
</$list>
"},"$:/config/shortcuts/snippet":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/snippet","text":"alt-S"},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/snippet":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/snippet","text":"⌨️ Create snippet
"},"$:/language/Snippets/toc":{"title":"$:/language/Snippets/toc","tags":"$:/tags/TextEditor/Snippet","caption":"Markdown Toc","text":"@[toc]$1
"}}}
